name: [Zomboid]
description:
WAR VS ZOMBI!!!

This game was a mad rush-to-win defense game. It was quite easy to get started but requires agile and strategy quite a lot.Building heroes to rush into enemies’ territory and keeps your own basement not to be destroyed.With special power and upgrade system, the battle could be more and more exciting.Each time you win a level, there will be a chance to upgrade and an interstitial ads would be shown.The superbox would support your team a great quantity of resources. And the in app purchase shop would be activated after you consumed all of them.


WARRING !!
- Game in Alpha. 
 - Bugs and not working functionality

Android version comen soon
